md:
giải nghĩa từ "tasting" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ trái nghĩa.

* Tasting (noun): the act of testing the flavor of something by taking a small amount into your mouth
	+ Ví dụ: "The chef did a tasting of the new dish before serving it to the customers."
	+ Từ loại: noun
	+ Từ liên quan: taste, flavor, sample
	+ Từ trái nghĩa: none

* Tasting (verb): to test the flavor of something by taking a small amount into your mouth
	+ Ví dụ: "She tasted the wine and said it was too sweet."
	+ Từ loại: verb
	+ Từ liên quan: taste, sample, savor
	+ Từ trái nghĩa: none

Note: The verb "tasting" is often used in the present participle form, as in "I am tasting the soup to see if it needs more salt."

  • Tasting (verb): to test the flavor of something by taking a small amount into your mouth

Note: The verb "tasting" is often used in the present participle form, as in "I am tasting the soup to see if it needs more salt."
